title: A double-blind control is essential for which of

content.prompt: A double-blind control is essential for which of the following?

choices.label: A study comparing the IQ test scores of children from different educational systems
A study of relationships among family members
Assessment of a treatment designed to reduce schizophrenic symptoms
A survey of drug use among teenagers

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
